title: ETSI Domain Application + Industry
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-application-industry-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20338
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain Application + Industry
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Cross-domain marker for metaverse application components focused on industrial applications including manufacturing simulations, industrial digital twins, predictive maintenance, remote operations, and industrial training systems.
	- source:: [[ETSI GS MEC]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainApplicationIndustry
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]], [[VirtualEconomyDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-application-industry-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[ArtificialIntelligence]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Domain Taxonomy]]
		- enables:: [[Industrial Application Classification]]
		- enables:: [[Manufacturing Platform Categorization]]
		- categorizes:: [[Manufacturing Simulation]]
		- categorizes:: [[Predictive Maintenance]]
		- categorizes:: [[Remote Operations]]
		- categorizes:: [[Industrial Digital Twin]]
		- depends-on:: [[VirtualEconomyDomain]]
		- depends-on:: [[InfrastructureDomain]]

ontology.definition: Cross-domain marker for metaverse application components focused on industrial applications including manufacturing simulations, industrial digital twins, predictive maintenance, remote operations, and industrial training systems.
